title: Funds Rush to Bet on China-Hong Kong Stock Link After 27% Return
description: A popular strategy pops up in Hong Kong around this time each year: betting on which stocks will be added to a trading link giving mainland buyers easy access to the city’s shares.
content: A popular strategy pops up in Hong Kong around this time each year: betting on which stocks will be added to a trading link giving mainland buyers easy access to the city’s shares.
